description: Before the game starts, choose one of the following abilities, these apply for the duration of the battle.
- Stalkers: Your oponent must substract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this unit in the shooting phase. additionally, models in the unit gain +1 for their saving throw if they are in cover
- Murder Cultists: You can reroll failed hit rolls for this unit in the fight phase
- Hereteks: All models in this unit have a save characteristic of 4+ instead of 5+. The entire unit also gains Krak grenades
rules.name: Specialists
